headline: Charles River Labs (CRL) Is Down 6.7% After Strategic Overhaul and $1B Buyback Plan Announced
summary: In the past week, Charles River Laboratories International announced a major strategic overhaul following third-quarter results, including plans to divest underperforming businesses totaling about 7% of revenue, ramping up cost-saving measures expected to save US$70 million annually by 2026, and adopting a new US$1 billion share repurchase authorization. This move signals an accelerated effort to sharpen business focus and enhance shareholder value amid continued demand challenges and...
